name: brew_rival_01
text: Nothing wrong with water a bit of hops and malt couldn't fix.
text_simple: nothing wrong with water a bit of hops and malt couldnt fix

name: brew_rival_02
text: What you need, Morphling, is a nice foamy head.
text_simple: what you need morphling is a nice foamy head

name: brew_rival_04
text: Water water everywhere, but I wouldn't drink you.
text_simple: water water everywhere but i wouldnt drink you

name: brew_rival_06
text: Slardar, you drink like a fish.
text_simple: slardar you drink like a fish

name: brew_rival_07
text: I've no use for spirits of the non-drinkable variety.
text_simple: ive no use for spirits of the nondrinkable variety

name: brew_rival_08
text: I prefer my spirits in liquid form.
text_simple: i prefer my spirits in liquid form

name: brew_rival_09
